testimonials.title: Testimonials from those who have worked with me
testimonials.sub_title: Those who have worked with me have something to say — and I am truly grateful.

testimonials.quote: It was rewarding to see the positive response to the website since its launch. The reception was incredibly warm. The visuals, layout, content, navigation — everything has been enthusiastically praised. Even my father, who took a look at the code, said it was “clean”; coming from him, that is a huge compliment. On launch day alone we had over 1,000 visitors. I have received messages highlighting the organization, clarity, and identity of DOVE, which has become even stronger with our online presence. I am deeply grateful to everyone involved. Without a doubt, a success.
testimonials.name: Joseph Murray
testimonials.title: Director at DOVE Research

testimonials.quote: Felipe was one of the best professionals I have had the opportunity to work with — always dedicated and 100% focused on delivering projects with quality, regardless of the challenges. He cares about every stage of the development process, not limiting himself to coding. In the projects we worked on together, he performed very well as tech lead with the client and achieved strong results with the team. He communicates effectively and knows how to stand out in difficult situations. Felipe learns quickly and has great autonomy to lead any project.
testimonials.name: Igor Casconi de Oliveira
testimonials.title: Software Engineer
